title: Mortal Kombat 1 Review - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

Mitchell Saltzman and Kahlief Adams join us to review Mortal Kombat 1. 

Follow Mitchell https://twitter.com/JurassicRabbit 

Follow Kahlief here: https://twitter.com/KahliefAdams

Time Stamps - 
0:00:00 - Start
00:27:52 - ADS
00:27:52: - The future of MK1
00:33:20 - Character Changes

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1
